permission_denied_message.text: {0} Sorry, you have not permissions for use this feature. Please, check you permission roles. Metadata: userid: {1} username: {2}

help_for_posts_list.text: {0} To get a backup copy of the list of posts, send links to posts in a list (each new link with a new message line). This message will be automatically split into a number of messages equal to the number of links and processed in the order of the queue. {1} Example: https://www.instagram.com/p/QwEr_tY1234 https://www.instagram.com/p/QwEr_tY1235 https://www.instagram.com/p/QwEr_tY1236

help_for_reschedule_queue.text: {0} To reschedule the processing of messages in the queue, simply send a list of messages with a modified processing time. for example: q1wRty12345: scheduled for 2021-12-31 23:59:59 q1wRty12346: scheduled for 2021-12-31 23:59:59 q1wRty12347: scheduled for 2021-12-31 23:59:59

wrong_reschedule_queue.text: {0} Incorrect format for rescheduling messages in the queue. Please check this conditions: 1. Post-id is a string and its length is equal to 11 characters. 2. Date-time format is correct and the date is in the future. 3. The message format is correct: q1wRty12345: scheduled for 2021-12-31 23:59:59 4. Each new message is on a new line. 5. Timestamp is not in the past: current time {1}
